protocol.text: Arabidopsis pvip1 pvip2 mutants and corresponding Col-0 wild type seed were germinated on MS agar plates and cultivated at 21degreeC (16h light).
10 days after germination seedlings were harvested; roots of wild type seedlings were removed; vestigial hypocotyl of mutants was cut to control for wounding effects.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

TRI reagent (Sigma) extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer instructions; further clean-up of RNA was performed with RNeasy Plant Mini columns (Qiagen) according to manufacturerâ€™s instructions.
